subtitleNullable: Digikala fashion dataset for color classification task
descriptionNullable:
### Context
This dataset is shared publicly by Digikala (one of the biggest online e-commerce markets in Asia) for an online challenge. The data includes the images of various products which come in colors. I found it difficult to define a model to predict the color of the items. So I shared it here.

### Content

All the images come in 224X224 pixels which is a great fit for famous models like VGG, AlexNet, Exception, .....


### Acknowledgements

I appreciate Digikala for investing so much in helping developers, AI engineers, and data scientists by providing open datasets in recent years.

### Inspiration
Who can find the best model to predict these tricky items? I will provide some handy notes I developed by R&D soon.
